data.title: Johnny Wright
data.meta_description: Dr. Johnny "John" Wright is the co-founder of MatianEnergy.Inc, and a member of the Warpers. John perused his dream and became a doctor. Eventually staring his incorporation named "MatianEnergy.Inc" where he produced energy for Matia and then eventually for Tonia. Doctor John is also credited...
data.text:
Dr. Johnny "John" Wright is the co-founder of MatianEnergy.Inc, and a member of the Warpers.[1]

Biography[]

Early life[]

John perused his dream and became a doctor. Eventually staring his incorporation named "MatianEnergy.Inc" where he produced energy for Matia and then eventually for Tonia.

Time travel project[]

Doctor John is also credited for his efforts on the time travel project, with the help of Professor Lynn they both created a functioning time machine, but it was destroyed years after by them both since the ability of time travel was extremally dangerous, eventually John disappeared and wasn't seen for a long time.

"They were looking for me, and I didn't know why, so I just had to leave."

â€”Johnny Wright to Lynn Loris-Bolton

John had disappeared for awhile and had gone completely off the radar, but while he was off the radar he was being hunted down by some unknown group of people but eventually after years of running he finally decided to fight, and in result he won. He finally got his freedom, but it's most likely he time travel with the destroyed time machine. Somehow, Johnny ended up in the year 2021.

Arriving to 2021[]

Eventually after a year everything settled down and he arrived in a universe named "Proton" where he eventually coincidentally met his old friend, Blixer.

Later on, Johnny is kidnapped by ZETA-59, which leads him to faking his death. After the death of ZETA, Johnny returns to his normal life, informing his friends he wasn't dead.
